tuv.seg: Children and the criminal justice system
Leanaí agus an córas ceartais choiriúil
The Children Act 2001 regulates the treatment of children found in breach of the criminal law
Rialaíonn Acht na Leanaí 2001 conas a dhéileáiltear le leanaí a sháraíonn an dlí coiriúil
Treatment of child suspects in Garda custody
Láimhseáil amhrasáin linbh i gcoinneáil na nGardaí
The treatment of children in Garda custody is covered by the Children Act 2001
Tá láimhseáil leanaí agus iad i gcoimeád na nGardaí clúdaithe ag an Acht um Leanaí 2001
The Criminal Justice Act 2006 introduced provisions for dealing with anti-social behaviour by children
Thug an tAcht um Cheartas Coiriúil forálacha isteach chun déileáil le hiompar frithshóisialta déanta ag leanaí
These provisions allow the Gardaí to deal with anti-social behaviour in a number of ways
Cuireann na forálacha sin ar chumas na nGardaí déileáil le hiompar frithshóisialta ar roinnt bealaí éagsúla
During the court proceedings of a child charged with an offence, the court may order that a family conference be held
Le linn na n-imeachtaí cúirte lena mbaineann leanbh a cúisíodh i gcion, féadfaidh an chúirt a ordú go gcuirtear comhdháil teaghlaigh ar bun
Diversion activities and programmes for young offenders
Gníomhaíochtaí athstiúrtha agus cláir d'ógchiontóirí
There are diversion and other programmes which aim to help children understand the consequences of crime and keep them out of the criminal justice system
Tá cláir athstiúrtha agus cláir eile ann a bhfuil sé mar aidhm acu cabhrú le páistí a thuiscint iarmhairtí na coireachta agus iad a choinneáil amach as an gcóras ceartais
Garda Juvenile Diversion Programme
Clár Athstiúrtha na nGardaí don Óige
The aim of the Garda Juvenile Diversion Programme is to prevent young offenders in Ireland from entering into the full criminal justice system by offering them a second chance

Tá sé mar aidhm ag Clár Athstiúrtha don Óige na nGardaí cosc a chur ar chiontóirí óga in Éirinn ag dul isteach sa chóras ceartais choiriúil iomlán. Déantar é seo trí sheans eile a thabhairt do na ciontóirí óga
As an alternative to detention of children, the Children Act 2001 provides for a range of community sanctions that can be imposed by the courts
Déanann Acht na Leanaí 2001 foráil i gcomhair réimse smachtbhannaí pobail gur féidir leis na cúirteanna a chur i bhfeidhm mar rogha eile ar choinneáil leanaí
Overview of institutions where children are detained by the Courts
Osamharc ar institiúidí ina mbíonn leanaí á gcoinneáil ag na Cúirteanna
Factors taken into account regarding their detention by the Courts
Fachtóirí a thugtar san áireamh ag na Cúirteanna maidir lena gcoinneáil
The Children Court deals with children under 18 years of age and came into operation in 2002
Bíonn an Chúirt Leanaí ag déileáil le leanaí faoi 18 mbliana d'aois agus tháinig sé i bhfeidhm i 2002
The Children Act 2001 sets out the various rules regarding the Children Court
Leagann Acht Leanaí 2001 amach na rialacha difriúla maidir leis an gCúirt Leanaí
